item.description: I-70 east at Exit 227 - Westwater. This is the last exit along I-70 in Utah. This is also the exit to access the Westwater whitewater run on the Colorado River.

item.title: I-70 East Onramp - Exit 187
item.description: I-70 east onramp at Exit 187. Turn left for I-70 east.

item.title: I-70 East Onramp to Grand Junction
item.description: I-70 East Onramp to Grand Junction (Colorado) at Exit 187.

item.title: I-70 East Approaching Exit 175
item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 175 - Floy. This exit previously was called Ranch Exit.

item.title: End UT-260 at UT-24
item.description: End UT-260 at UT-24. Turn right on UT-24 east for Sigurd and Richfield, and for access to I-70 and US-89. Turn left on UT-24 for Salina.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 182
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 182 - US-191 South/Crescent Junction/Moab. US-191 south leaves I-70 here.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 160
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 160 - BL-70/UT-19/Green River.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South at I-70
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South at I-70. Merge right for I-70 west; merge left for US-191 South and US-16 East (not signed here). US-191 joins I-70 east to Crescent Junction. US-6 joins I-70 east to Fruita, Colorado.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South at I-70
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South at I-70. Use I-70 west for Salina; I-70/US-6 East/US-191 South for Green River.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South Approaching I-70
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South approaching I-70. Use I-70 west for Hanksville; use I-70 East/US-6 East/US-191 South for Moab (via US-191 South) and Grand Junction (Colorado).

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South Approaching I-70
item.description: Federal lands directions on US-6 East/US-191 South approaching I-70. Use I-70 west for Capitol Reef National Park and Lake Powell. Use I-70/US-6 East/US-191 South for Canyonlands National Park and Arches National Park.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South Approaching I-70
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South approaching I-70 in Emery County. US-6 East joins I-70 east to Fruita, Colorado; US-191 south joins I-70 east to Crescent Junction.
